entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -9.7°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 4.8 km

Dewpoint: -12.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or snow squalls. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this morning. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
